precontext: Emma arrived at the boardroom early that morning. She spent the previous night preparing her material carefully. The picture she was ready to share was going to be key to the discussion.
sentence: The picture she presented at the meeting was both striking and thought-provoking.
ending: Everyone was thoroughly impressed by her images.
meanings_considered: a visual representation (of an object or scene or person or abstraction) produced on a surface
a situation treated as an observable object
explanation:
• The precontext mentions Emma preparing "material" and presenting a "picture" at a meeting, which strongly suggests a visual representation.  
• The sentence describes the picture as "striking and thought-provoking," a description typically applied to visual images, not abstract economic conditions.  
• The ending states "Everyone was thoroughly impressed by her images," confirming the meaning as visual representations, not abstract situations.
clear_meaning_text: a visual representation (of an object or scene or person or abstraction) produced on a surface

AMBIGUOUS = both meanings could work, or neither clearly dominates
